name: She doesn't Want to Leave me
name_original: She doesn't Want to Leave me
description:
EN-US

She doesn't Want to Leave me, a Horror Game where you play Meddy, a Girl who recently lost her Sister in an Accident, she still sees her in Shapes and Thoughts, and tries to explain but her other family members don't believe in her. 

Explore and Find out the Outcome of this Story Based on Your Actions!!!

He takes inspiration from: Features from "Mr Hopp's Playhouse", Graphics from "House", and Pieces of History from "Bleach"

And, it Was made for Jam: (Trijam #152)

https://itch.io/jam/trijam-152

--------------------------------------------------------------------

PT-BR

She doesn't Want to Leave me, um Jogo de Terror onde você Joga com Meddy, uma Garota que Recentemente perdeu sua Irmã em um Acidente, ela Ainda Vê ela em Vultos e Pensamentos, e Tenta Explicar mas seus Outros Familiares não Acreditam.

Desbrave e Descubra o Desfecho dessa Historia com Base nas suas Ações!!!

Ele tem Inspirações em: Funcionalidades de "Mr Hopp's Playhouse", Graficos em "House", e Pedaços da Historia de  "Bleach"

E, foi Feito para a Jam: (Trijam #152)

https://itch.io/jam/trijam-152
